string-array.name: array_list_of_conditions
string-array.item: All Objects with \"movie\" reference field included
Nominees from movie with running time less than 2 hrs
Nominees from movie with running time greater than 2 hrs
Nominees from movie with running time less than 2 hrs
Nominees from movie with running time greater than 2 hrs
Nominees born in US OR UK
Nominees born in US or UK AND with age less than or equal to 40

string-array.name: array_list_of_description
string-array.item: Description : All the objects that belong to \"nominees\" class
Description : include reference field so that response has the referred object included
Description : inQuery lets you query a reference field and retrieve objects that satisfy that query
Description : notinQuery lets you query a reference field and retrieve objects that do not satisfy that query
Description : select query lets you query on a class and use that result to query on a field that may or may not be a reference field
Description : Combine two or more queries. Objects returned satisfy any of these conditions. Logical OR
Description : Combine two or more queries. Objects returned satisfy all of these conditions. Logical AND
